column1: #Text=The polycrystalline samples of the nominal composition La2MMnO6 (M = Co, Ni and Cu) were prepared by conventional solid state reaction, by firing intimate stoichiometric mixtures of the oxides La2O3 and MnO2, and the M(II) oxides or carbonates involved in the formulations, Co(NO3), NiCO3·2Ni(OH)2·4H2O and CuO, respectively.
#Text=The reactions were carried out in air, in platinum crucibles, at 1000 °C.
#Text=The sample was maintained at this temperature, in the furnace, during 10 h.
#Text=Heating was interrupted several times to grind the reaction mixture to facilitate the reaction progress.
#Text=The samples were labelled as LaMMn-SP, where M indicates: Co, Ni or Cu.
